name: Mirum Orbis
storyline: Otium is one of the countries of the planet Ereda. This is where your story begins. The gods are in danger, Everia the primordial goddess has disappeared and with her her sword, the most powerful weapon ever created by the gods. To change this and avoid the destruction of creation by gods and demonic creatures, the remaining human gods have decided to resurrect you, to bring you from the fields of eternal rest, you a hero of old, in order to save a new times this world!
summary: Mirum Orbis - The Lands of Otium, is a 2D MMORPG created by the french video game studio Askilian Studio. Created since April 2022, the game plunges the hero into a universe full of mysteries and quests. Throughout the adventure, you will discover unforgettable landscapes and memorable dungeons. Dive into the fabulous world of Ereda and become the greatest hero of your own adventure.
